column1: rayford s. hill| rayford s. hill. born: june 24
column8: 2015 at baylor hospital in carrollton. mr. hill was born on june 23
column10: tx to l. b. and ailene hill. he retired from the denton state school. he is survived by daughters
column11: margene cudd and her husband bryan of denton
column12: la. donna carroll and her husband pat of ponder
column13: sharon hill of sanger; sisters novella loya and lottie hamm; seven grandchildren; six great-grandchildren. a graveside service will be held at 10:00 am tuesday
